name: Black & Associates, P.A.
description: This firm offers a range of accounting services, including small business accounting and bookkeeping

name: Hope Credit Union
description: While not a bookkeeping firm, Hope Credit Union is a Black-led Community Development Financial Institution that provides capital and technical assistance, including help with financial statements, to Black-owned businesses in Mississippi

name: Mississippi Black Pages
description: This is a statewide platform for Black entrepreneurs to connect for exposure and development, and they organize events that can lead to networking opportunities with financial service providers
